mapper.select: select *,substring_index(f_image,',',1) as mainImage from( SELECT h.*,g.num,round(6370996.81 * 2 * asin(sqrt( pow(sin(((#{lat} * PI() /180.0) - (f_latitude * PI() /180.0))/2),2) + cos(#{lat} * PI() /180.0) * cos(f_latitude * PI() /180.0) * pow(sin(((#{lon} - f_longitude) * PI()/180.0)/2),2)))) as duration from t_fish_site_base h LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(num) as num,f_site_base_uid from ((SELECT COUNT(*) AS num,f.f_site_base_uid from t_have_fish e LEFT JOIN t_fish_site_base f on e.f_uid = f.f_site_base_uid WHERE f.f_status = 1 GROUP BY f.f_site_base_uid) UNION(SELECT count(*)AS num,c.f_site_base_uid FROM t_have_fish d LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.f_employee_uid,a.f_site_base_uid from t_fish_site_base a LEFT JOIN t_fish_site_base_employee b on a.f_site_base_uid = b.f_site_uid WHERE a.f_status = 1)c ON c.f_employee_uid = d.f_uid and d.f_is_display = 0 GROUP BY c.f_site_base_uid))a GROUP BY f_site_base_uid)g ON h.f_site_base_uid = g.f_site_base_uid WHERE h.f_status = 1)a left join t_fish_site_base_info x on a.f_site_base_uid = x.f_site_base_uid order by a.duration LIMIT #{start},#{size}

select a.*,b.f_site_put_fish_info,b.f_site_size,b.f_site_charge,b.f_support_facility,b.f_image,g.num from (select *, round(6370996.81 * 2 * asin(sqrt( pow(sin(((#{lat} * PI() /180.0) - (f_latitude * PI() /180.0))/2),2) + cos(#{lat} * PI() /180.0) * cos(f_latitude * PI() /180.0) * pow(sin(((#{lon} - f_longitude) * PI()/180.0)/2),2)))) as duration FROM t_fish_site_base where f_status = 1 and f_site_base_uid = #{fishSiteUid}) a left join t_fish_site_base_info b on a.f_site_base_uid = b.f_site_base_uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(num) as num,f_site_base_uid from ((SELECT COUNT(*) AS num,f_uid AS f_site_base_uid from t_have_fish WHERE f_is_display = 0 AND f_uid = #{fishSiteUid}) UNION (SELECT COUNT(*) AS num,f_uid AS f_site_base_uid from t_have_fish WHERE f_is_display = 0 AND f_uid in( (SELECT f_employee_uid as f_uid FROM t_fish_site_base_employee WHERE f_site_uid = #{fishSiteUid}))))a)g ON a.f_site_base_uid = g.f_site_base_uid
mapper.update:
update t_fish_site_base_info
f_site_put_fish_info = #{putFishInfo},
f_site_size = #{siteSize},
f_site_charge = #{siteCharge},
f_support_facility = #{supportFacility},
f_image = #{image}
where f_site_base_uid = #{fishSiteUid}
